"Sedentary office? No problem! Let's turn it into a fitness hub with standing desks, yoga mats, and group exercise classes."
"Healthy habits don't have to be boring. Let's create a wellness challenge where employees compete to see who can log the most steps in a week."
"Why settle for just a desk job when you can also work out? We'll offer on-site workout equipment and fitness classes during lunch breaks."
"We know sitting is the new smoking, so let's create a standing desk challenge where employees can earn rewards for staying on their feet all day."
"Let's make fitness fun by hosting a monthly potluck where employees bring in healthy dishes they've made themselves. It's a great way to share recipes and promote healthy eating habits."
